name: David Johansen
description: '''David Roger Johansen''' (January 9, 1950 â€“ February 28, 2025) was an American singer, songwriter, and actor best known as lead singer of the seminal [[proto-punk]] band the [[New York Dolls]]. He is also known for his work under the pseudonym '''Buster Poindexter''' and for playing the [[Ghost of Christmas Past]] in '' [[Scrooged]]'' (1988).
